On the island, they faced many dangers, including the pursuit of sand pythons, the siege of insect monsters, the rebellion of pirates, and the test of ancient institutions. Finally, they arrived at the small world inside the volcano and found the ancient treasure ship 200 years ago. Here, Mu Ling and others discovered the treasure, the sand python and her missing father. In the intertwining of family, love, ambition and desire, they must defeat the sand python to achieve their own redemption.
